author: Football Italia staff
title: 'Why can't fans enter stadium?'
description: As the Bundesliga prepares to return next month, former Milan goalkeeper Jens Lehmann believes it should with some fans in attendance.  	German football has been halted since March 13, but the country began easing its coronavirus restrictions on Monday, with …
content:
As the Bundesliga prepares to return next month, former Milan goalkeeper Jens Lehmann believes it should with some fans in attendance.
